summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.6°C), outside temperature (down 3.4°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 330 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 4114 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and gentle breezes are expected. Possible light showers, overcast skies with low cloud, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
